California Treasurer Bill Lockyer told Reuters Insider Monday that states may not need the same freedom to declare bankruptcy as major companies because they have a guaranteed source of revenue. The major difference, of course, is that we're looking at sovereign governments that have the ability to enact a tax, and that's not the case of these private corporations that may have unfunded obligations that they can't deal with, he said. confirmed that it would be proper for the attorney general to obtain the views of ministers on the national interest before reaching his own independent decision. Ministers' views would be passed to the DPP and he would then exercise independent judgment, taking on board the serious considerations that have been given to the matter by other ministers and the attorney general. All this strikes me as perfectly proper. president of the Server and Tools Division which has grown into a$ 15 billion business on his watch, was unceremoniously deposed when Steve Ballmer notified employees by email that he will leave in June. The CEO wants to rectify Microsoft's misfires in mobile phones and tablet computers, as well as ensure that the company doesn't fall behind in cloud software, the news report said.
